title: Case Study: FDG and Amyloid PET in Dementia.
sentences: We present a case of memory loss and aphasia in a 72-y-old male, and discuss how PET imaging supported a diagnosis of Alzheimer's dementia despite conflicting clinical findings.
text: We present a case of memory loss and aphasia in a 72-y-old male, and discuss how PET imaging supported a diagnosis of Alzheimer's dementia despite conflicting clinical findings.
